articles.description: Kevin Federline supports ex-wife Britney Spears ending her longtime conservatorship, his lawyer told People that he hopes their sons Sean and Jayden would then 'have their mom at her best'.
articles.content:
Kevin Federline is in full support of his ex-wife Britney Spears ending her longtime conservatorship.
The 43-year-old former backup dancer, who shares two teen boys with the popstar, hopes that if B… [+8044 chars]

articles.author: Cally Brooks, Alice Peacock
articles.title: 'I've spent 5 years copying Kate Middleton's outfits - now I wear nothing else' - The Mirror
articles.description: Katie began taking outfit inspiration from the duchess soon after, binning her old wardrobe to replace her clothes with exact replicas for pieces the Duchess wore.
articles.content:
A Kate Middleton superfan threw out her old clothes and has spent the past five years recreating different fashion looks from the duchess after becoming obsessed in April 2016.
